mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT ur.*, r.name as role_name, r.code as role_code, r.description as role_description, u.username, u.nickname FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
